Client.want-to-message-description:
Browse engineers to find someone you like to message and message them,
using the "Message me" button at the bottom of their advert.

AudioEngineer.where-are-messages-description: You will be able to see messages from your clients right after they message you!

SeeYourAdvert.error-advert-not-posted: You have not yet posted your advert. Navigate to the "Add advert" section.
SeeYourAdvert.error-fallback: Error while trying to see your advert.

AddAdvert.title: Fill in your advert information
AddAdvert.title-placeholder: e.g. I will mix your song for cheap!
AddAdvert.description-placeholder: e.g I have been mixing songs for more than 15 years..
AddAdvert.click-to: Click to upload or drag and drop
AddAdvert.cover-image-description: This image will be visible to clients who see your advert.
AddAdvert.portfolio-description: This is a link to your Spotify or Apple Music playlist.
AddAdvert.price-description: This will be shown as your advert price.
AddAdvert.error-image-size: File must be smaller than 4 MB.
AddAdvert.error-portfolio-url: Please enter a valid playlist URL (e.g. https://...).
AddAdvert.error-advert-already-posted: You have already posted an advert.

EditAdvert.title: Perform desired changes to your advert
EditAdvert.current-title-description: The current title of you advert.
EditAdvert.current-description-description: The current description of your advert.
EditAdvert.current-portfolio-url-description: The current link to your Spotify/Apple Music portfolio playlist.
EditAdvert.current-price-description: The current price set for your services.
EditAdvert.error-title-len-min: Title must be at least 1 character.
EditAdvert.error-description-len-min: Description must be at least 100 characters.
EditAdvert.error-portfolio-url: Please enter a valid playlist URL (e.g. https://...).
EditAdvert.error-non-dirty: You must change at least one field in order to submit the data.
EditAdvert.error-no-advert-posted: You have not yet posted your advert, please navigate to "Add your advert" section, in order to add your advert.

DeleteAdvert.title: You are about to delete your advert!
DeleteAdvert.description:
By deleting your advert, you will no longer be able to receive messages from new clients. 
If you want to keep receiving requests, you can simply edit your advert instead of deleting it.
DeleteAdvert.error-no-advert-posted: You have not yet posted your advert, please navigate to "Add your advert" section, in order to add your advert.

Login.email-description: The mail you provided during singing up.
Login.error-password-len: Password must be at least 6 characters long.

Register.email-description: This address will be displayed to other users.
Register.first-name-description: Your first name will be visible to other users.
Register.last-name-description: Your last name will be visible to other users.
Register.phone-number-description: This number will be visible to other users.
Register.password-description: Make sure you pick a complex password!
Register.what-do-you-want: What do you want to do?
Register.what-do-you-want-opt-engineer: I am an audio engineer and I want to advertise my services.
Register.what-do-you-want-opt-client: I am a client and I want to find an audio engineer.
Register.error-first-name-min: First name must be at least 1 character.
Register.error-first-name-max: First name can be 100 characters max.
Register.error-last-name-min: Last name must be at least 1 character.
Register.error-last-name-max: Last name can be 100 characters max.
Register.error-password-min: Password must be at least 6 characters long.

VerifyAccount.enter:
Please enter the verification code sent to your e-mail address.
 This code will expire in 24 hours!
VerifyAccount.success: Successfully verified your account! You now need to login.
VerifyAccount.error-expired-code: Your email verification code has expired. Please contact the support via s28016@pjwstk.edu.pl.

ForgotPassword.description:
In order to reset your forgotten password, please fill in your email address. 
An email message will be sent to your inbox containing further instructions.
ForgotPassword.success: Please check your email for instructions.

VerifyForgotPassword.description:
Please set your new password, 
you will be redirected to login after that.
VerifyForgotPassword.success: Successfully set your new password, you will be redirected to login again.
VerifyForgotPassword.error-new-password-len: New password must be at least 6 characters long.
VerifyForgotPassword.error-new-password-repeated-len: Password repeated must be at least 6 characters long.
VerifyForgotPassword.error-password-must-differ: New password must be different from the old password.

SeeGuide.title: Guide for using the platform
SeeGuide.short-description:
Platform allows collaboration with audio engineers, who specialize in: Mixing, Mastering or Production. 
To get started read the following guide.
SeeGuide.description:
When you register, you are required to pick a role, either Audio Engineer or Client.
 Based on your role you are able to post and manage your advert or chat with engineers.
SeeGuide.client-description-pt-1:
Q: How to chat with an engineer?
 A: Navigate to the "See all adverts", pick an engineers advert, scroll down and press the "Message me" button.
SeeGuide.client-description-pt-2:
Q: How to send files to the engineer?
 A: After entering the Chat view with your desired engineer, press the "Attachment" icon and attach your files.
SeeGuide.client-description-pt-3:
Q: What kind of files can I send?
 A: You are able to send files with the following formats: WAV, MP3, FLAC, JPG, PNG and ZIP.
SeeGuide.audio-engineer-description-pt-1:
Q: How to post an advert?
 A: Simply navigate to the "Add advert" section and fill in the form data.
SeeGuide.audio-engineer-description-pt-2:
Q: How to edit my advert?
 A: Navigate to the "Edit my advert" section and perform any necessary changes,
 you can edit the suggested price of your service and its description.
SeeGuide.audio-engineer-description-pt-3:
Q: How do I know if a client has messaged me?
 A: You will see client names on the left side sidebar whenever someone messages you.
 You will also see a notification whenever you are not in the chat view and you are just browsing the platform.

SeeAllAdverts.error-no-adverts-for-term: No adverts found for the given search term.
SeeAllAdverts.category-mixing-description: Want to see adverts related to mixing your songs? Work only with professionals and make sure your songs sound the best.
SeeAllAdverts.category-mastering-description: Looking for a good mastering engineer? Make sure your songs sounds the best on streaming platforms and in different rooms.
SeeAllAdverts.category-production-description: Trying to get the best instrumentals for your songs? Find only the best instrumentals and connect with the best producers.
SeeAllAdverts.category-all-description: Want to look at all posted adverts? This way you can see which engineers advert suits your needs the most.

SeeAdvert.price-inquiry: This is a price per one inquiry of category
SeeAdvert.share-own-experience: Share your own experience with this engineer!
SeeAdvert.review-placeholder: e.g Working with this engineer was great...
SeeAdvert.login-to-message: To message this engineer, you need to login first.
SeeAdvert.engineer-cant-message: You are an engineer yourself, you cannot send messages.
SeeAdvert.error-content-len-min: Review content has to be 35 characters minimum.
SeeAdvert.error-content-len-max: Review content can be 1500 characters maximum.

Chat.wait-for-upload: Wait until the file finishes uploading!
Chat.error-no-data-provided-description: You need to attach 1 file or write a text message in order to send it!

ResetPassword.title: Password reset form
ResetPassword.description:
Changing your password will require you to verify your new password by clicking a link sent to your email!
You will also be logged out and will need to log in again!
ResetPassword.complex-password-hint: Make sure you pick a complex password!
ResetPassword.new-password-min-length: Password must be at least 8 characters long.
ResetPassword.repeat-password-min-length: Repeated password must be at least 8 characters long.
ResetPassword.success-message: You will be logged out, please check your email inbox for instructions.

ResetEmail.title: Email address reset form
ResetEmail.description:
After submitting the form, an email containing a confirmation link will be sent to your new email address. 
 Your current email address is displayed below.
ResetEmail.public-description: This address will be displayed to other users.
ResetEmail.not-different-error: Your new email needs to be different!
ResetEmail.success-message: Successfully reset your email, you will be logged out, please check your email inbox for instructions.
ResetEmail.new-email-min-length: Email address must be at least 10 characters long.

ResetPhoneNumber.title: Phone number reset form
ResetPhoneNumber.description: Please input your new phone number. Your current number is displayed below.
ResetPhoneNumber.public-description: This number will be visible to other users.
ResetPhoneNumber.not-different-error: Your new phone number needs to be different!
ResetPhoneNumber.min-length: Phone number must be at least 9 characters long.
